item.title: Aconex suggestions
item.description: 1: Add search function to create group 2: Fix compatibiity with mobile devices 3: Fix app crashing when opening a PDF Test case Feedback Use th e feedback form to post suggestions. Keep a note of the dates posted and any correspondance Aconex feature Requests Hyperlinking to Recent revision https://www.aconex.com/support/ideas-exchange/latest-ideas/creating-links-aconex-documents-outside-aconex Fix issues with Favourites The Aconex iPad app is great, however the favorites feature is lacking user friendliness.
